lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The narrowing of the gap between downgrades and upgrades would reflect a calming in takeover frenzy, less volatile energy markets and slow but steady economic growth, S and P said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S and P noted that 60 pct of 1986's downgrades were concentrated in the industrial sector, where the most negative factor was takeover fever that led to debt-financed mergers and acquisitions and costly defenses to fend off takeovers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Utilities, which were a positive influence in the overall 1986 trend, should be a pocket of strength again this year.
